jwt._admin: Admin has access to all APIs
jwt._user: User only has access to /volumes endpoint

_executor_comment: Execute plugin. Possible choices: mock, ssh
mock: This setting is used for testing and development.
It will not send commands to any node.
ssh:  This setting will notify Heketi to ssh to the nodes.
It will need the values in sshexec to be configured.
kubernetes: Communicate with GlusterFS containers over
glusterfs._sshexec_comment: SSH username and private key file information
glusterfs._refresh_time_monitor_gluster_nodes: Refresh time in seconds to monitor Gluster nodes
glusterfs._start_time_monitor_gluster_nodes: Start time in seconds to monitor Gluster nodes when the heketi comes up
_loglevel_comment: none, critical, error, warning, info, debug
